summary: A test suite that validates various voice activity detection utility functions, including label alignment, conversion of frame labels to speech segments, construction of perâ€‘file VAD objects, extraction of nonspeech intervals, and parsing of RTTM files into pyannote-compatible structures.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of VAD processing components used in speech analytics and diarization workflows, reducing errors in speech segment extraction and annotation handling.
